briefTitle: Subcutaneous Progesterone Versus Vaginal Progesterone Gel for Luteal Phase Support in Patients Undergoing In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF)

outcomeMeasures.title: Ongoing Pregnancy Rate at the End of the Study
Delivery Rate and Live Birth Rate
Implantation Rate
outcomeMeasures.description: Implantation rate was defined as the mean of the total number of gestational sacs seen divided by the total number of embryos transferred. Values are reported as a percentage.
